insert into spare_parts (part_no, part_name, category, brand, spec, unit, cost_price, sale_price, safety_stock, max_stock, location, supplier, is_active, created_time, updated_time, remarks) values (#{partNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{safetyStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update spare_parts set part_no = #{partNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_name = #{partName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, safety_stock = #{safetyStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_stock = #{maxStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select part_id, part_no, part_name, category, brand, spec, unit, cost_price, sale_price, safety_stock, max_stock, location, supplier, is_active, created_time, updated_time, remarks from spare_parts where part_id = #{partId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
